snippet: Some viewers of Thursday night's Hollywood Week episode of "American Idol" were dismayed that the producers chose to exploit an accident by one of the contestants - over and over and over - and failed to show much of the singing.
abstract: Some viewers of Thursday night's Hollywood Week episode of "American Idol" were dismayed that the producers chose to exploit an accident by one of the contestants - over and over and over - and failed to show much of the singing.

headline.main: 'American Idol' Watch: Engineered Drama Trumps Actual Singing
